import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../Components/navbar"; import Footer from "../Components/footer"; const Contact = () => { const [messageSent, setMessageSent] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setMessageSent(true); // Optionally reset after a delay setTimeout(() => setMessageSent(false), 5000); }; return ( <>
{/* Header Section */}

Get in Touch

We'd love to hear from you! Fill out the form below, and our team will respond promptly.

{/* Confirmation Box */} {messageSent && (
✅ Message sent successfully!
)}
); }; export default Contact;
